section.title: Description
section.para: Move a file or fileset to a new file or directory.

listitem.para: Domain: Valid filename pointing to existing file
Description: Directory to which file(s) should be moved to
Domain: Valid directoryname pointing to existing directory

section.title: RNG Specification
section.programlisting: <define name="move"> <element name="move"> <ref name="dir_if_unless"/> <choice> <group> <attribute name="file"/> <attribute name="to_file"/> </group> <group> <attribute name="file"/> <attribute name="to_directory"/> </group> <group> <attribute name="to_directory"/> <ref name="fileset"/> </group> </choice> </element> </define>

section.title: Examples
section.programlisting:
<move file="readme.txt" to_file="readme1.txt"/>
<move file="readme.txt" to_directory="/tmp"/>
<move to_directory="/tmp"> <fileset dir="kernel" include="@(**/*.ge)"/> </move>
